pr_title: MULE-18619: Component models not set for infrastructure types in AST

timeline.bodyText: should this be called depedencyExtensions or something like that? The intent of the parameter is now lost
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: seems like nothing change here other than formatting? Is taht the case? Can it be reverted then?
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

replies.bodyText: no, i turned this around, before it iterated the children and matched those against the parameter models, now it iterates the parameter models and looks it up in the dsl.
replies.author: elrodro83

timeline.bodyText: the flatMaps in a row?? ufff...
timeline.author: marianogonzalez
